job_description:
We are seeking a highly skilled Senior React Full stack Developer to join our team and help us build state-of-the-art web solutions that will drive the future of our industry. If you are passionate about delivering exceptional web experiences and possess the technical expertise to make it happen, we want to hear from you.

Key Responsibilities

As a Senior React Full stack Developer, you will play a crucial role in our development team. Your responsibilities will include:

Developing and maintaining responsive web applications using React (v17).
Collaborating with product managers, designers, and other developers to implement user-friendly and efficient web solutions.
Utilizing TypeScript, GraphQL, and CSS/Sass to create robust and scalable frontend components.
Building server-side APIs and services using Node.js.
Integrating external APIs and services, including but not limited to Contentful, for dynamic content management.
Implementing client-side data fetching and caching using SWR.
Ensuring internationalization (I18n) support for a global user base.
Staying up-to-date with industry best practices and emerging technologies to continuously improve our web development processes.

Qualifications

To be successful in this role, you should possess the following qualifications:

10+ years of overall experience in web development.
5+ years of hands-on experience with React.
Proficiency in TypeScript, GraphQL, and CSS/Sass.
Strong knowledge of Node.js for server-side development.
Familiarity with Vite (Nice to have).
Experience with Contentful or other content management systems (Nice to have).
Knowledge of client-side data fetching and caching with SWR (Nice to have).
Demonstrated ability to support internationalization (I18n) (Nice to have).

Soft Skills

In addition to technical skills, we are looking for candidates who exhibit the following soft skills:

High attention to detail: You should take pride in delivering clean, efficient, and error-free code.
Good communicator: Effective communication is vital to our collaborative development environment.
Enthusiastic problem solver: We value team members who are proactive, resourceful, and passionate about finding solutions.

Apply at diana.kader@markitech.ca
